definition: to utilize/to put sth to use
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The hitherto unutilized amount of the property value is opened for use.
sentences.chinese: 迄今未動用餘額的財產價值是開放供使用。

sentences.english: Only use the handbrake when your vehicle is stationary.
sentences.chinese: 只有在停車時才動用手剎。

sentences.english: Bendong block is the biggest one that is not developed in Yanqi Basin.
sentences.chinese: 本東區塊是焉耆油區最大的未動用含油氣區塊。

sentences.english: Vertical producing degree of super heavy oil reservoirs in Shul area is understood through monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 通過監測手段，瞭解曙一區超稠油油層縱向動用程度。

sentences.english: The breaking into this money of Vernon's was one of the first great errata of my life;
sentences.chinese: 動用佛南這筆款項是我一生中早期重大的錯誤之一。

sentences.english: The Thai government has no intention of closing the Thai-Cambodia border and will not use military force to deal with this bilateral problem, he said.
sentences.chinese: 但他表示泰國不會關閉兩國邊境或動用武力解決問題。

sentences.english: The other is that it easily suffers from the re-direction attack for the users.
sentences.chinese: 該協議對於移動用戶易遭受重定向攻擊。

sentences.english: It’s time to use the force for good.
WHDH New England's news, weather, sports source.
sentences.chinese: WHDH新英格蘭的新聞，天氣，運動用品。

sentences.english: Washington also has begun dispersing medicine from a federal stockpile.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓當局也開始動用聯邦庫存，分發藥品。

sentences.english: Both sides engaged in artillery and heavy-machinegun fire.
sentences.chinese: 雙方均動用了大炮與重型機槍。

sentences.english: He got a gravy-train job in the government by pulling strings.
sentences.chinese: 他動用關係在政府部門謀得了一份美差。

sentences.english: The setup is basically the same, but the user interface has been tailored to fit better into the mobile user experience.
sentences.chinese: 但用戶界面經過調整以更好的適應移動用戶體驗。

sentences.english: Others have used their political allies to squeeze out foreign partners.
sentences.chinese: 其他的一些公司動用政治同盟排擠外國合作伙伴。

sentences.english: What are you using your imagination for?
sentences.chinese: 試問你動用你的想象力幹了什麼？

sentences.english: It maintained its target of having more than 100 million mobile subscribers in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 該公司2011年移動用戶超過1億的目標不變。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
to demand payment of money owing
to freeze (water etc)/(fig.) to freeze (assets, prices etc)
to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
